DOC.brief_title: Different Lipid Emulsions Acute Lung Injury Patients
DOC.criteria: Inclusion : Acute Lung Injury result proven pneumonia ( xray ) witness aspiration Oxygenation factor ≤ 300 < = 72 hour since intubation noninvasive ventilatory support mask screening Expected need parenteral nutrition least 5 day Male female ≥ 18 year age Exclusion : Exclusion pregnancy woman childbearing potential Cardiogenic pulmonary oedema Previous ( < 1 month ) ongoing need corticosteroid > 0.1 mg/kg/d prednisolonequivalent immune suppressive treatment Active previous ( < 1 year ) treatment solid haematologic malignancy Serum triglycerides > 300 mg/dl screen Alterations coagulation ( thrombocytes < 100 Giga/l ) , aPTT > 60 sec , INR ≥ 2.5 without therapeutic intervention Autoimmune disease HIV ( accord medical history ) Known suspect drug abuse General contraindication infusion therapy :
